quotes.quote: It's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
We are almost always bored by just those whom we must not find boring.
There is no conversation more boring than the one where everybody agrees.
Being dull and boring is far more tragic than being tacky.
There is nothing boring in life except ourselves
Never fail to know that if you are doing all the talking, you are boring somebody.
For most people, life would be boring without meaningful work.
The secret of boring people lies in telling them everything.
The secret of being boring is to say everything.
Being bored is an insult to oneself.
Perfection is boring. If a face doesn't have mistakes, it's nothing.

The boring thing with taking a walk with someone is that your thoughts are then dictated by the subject or subjects of your conversation; and that is made worse by the fact that most sane people are terrified of silence whenever they are with or near someone.
Never be bored, and you will never be boring.
There is no such thing as a boring person when you are lonely or extremely bored.
It gets so boring you know just to do the same thing over and over again.
Boredom is a vital problem for the moralist, since at least half of the sins of mankind are caused by the fear of it.
Beauty without expression is boring.
Boredom is only for boring people with no imagination.
Boring is a syndrome of being too simple.
Nothing is boring if you look at carefully.
The most boring scenes are the scenes where a character is alone.
One way to prevent conversation from being boring is to say the wrong thing.
Life is never boring, but some people choose to be bored.
Yes, I guess you could say I am a loner, but I feel more lonely in a crowded room with boring people than I feel on my own.
Life can be boring unless you put some effort into it.
All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never, ever be boring.
If something is boring after two minutes, try it for four. If still boring, then eight. Then sixteen. Then thirty-two. Eventually one discovers that it is not boring at all.
Too much good taste can be boring.
Nothing is so boring as having to keep up a deception.
Running became boring because it's so predictable. I got to a point where I knew what my competition could do.
I guess we'd be living in a boring, perfect world if everybody wished everybody else well.
A stair not worn hollow by footsteps is, regarded from its own point of view, only a boring something made of wood.
There's nothing more boring than unintelligent actors, because all they have to talk about is themselves and acting. There have to be other things.
An author is a fool who, not content with boring those he lives with, insists on boring future generations.
Just standing around looking beautiful is so boring, really boring, so boring.
A finished person is a boring person.
We tend to do period stuff because it helps make it one step removed from boring everyday reality.
Any subject can be made interesting, and therefore any subject can be made boring.
Hobbies of any kind are boring except to people who have the same hobby. This is also true of religion, although you will not find me saying so in print.
I thought that subtitles are boring because they're there generally to serve us with information to make you understand what people are saying in a different language.
One must work, if not from inclination, at least out of despair. Since it proves, on close examination, that work is less boring than amusing oneself.
The only way a woman can ever reform a man is by boring him so completely that he loses all possible interest in life.
No place is boring, if you've had a good night's sleep and have a pocket full of unexposed film.
What if it's boring or if it's not boring, it might be too revealing, or worse, it might be too revealing and still be boring.
There's a danger of the Internet just becoming loud, ugly and boring with a thousand voices screaming for attention.
God help us if we ever take the theater out of the auction business or anything else. It would be an awfully boring world.
I can excuse everything but boredom. Boring people don't have to stay that way.
Sometimes the most positive thing you can be in a boring society is absolutely negative.
Highly educated bores are by far the worst; they know so much, in such fiendish detail, to be boring about.
Without music to decorate it, time is just a bunch of boring production deadlines or dates by which bills must be paid.
Life is better than death, I believe, if only because it is less boring, and because it has fresh peaches in it.
Every kind of music is good, except the boring kind.
There is something curiously boring about somebody else's happiness.
There is nothing more boring for an intelligent woman than to spend endless amounts of time with small children.
An honest lie is better than a boring truth.
You can't want to be happy, because that's too easy and too boring.
